<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script_client"><sys_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Testetesteteste</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
    var sysID = g_form.getUniqueValue();
    var ga = new GlideAjax('global.customCatalogUtil');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCatalogValues');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_sysID', sysID);
    ga.getXML(ajaxResponse);
    function ajaxResponse(serverResponse) {
        var answer = serverResponse.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		alert(answer);
        if(answer == 'true'){
            g_form.addInfoMessage("your message");
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-21 15:13:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7a56d283dbdf10105bc027374896195b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Testetesteteste</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_client_7a56d283dbdf10105bc027374896195b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 15:13:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><view/></sys_script_client></record_update>
